column2: "Hom nhwɛ yie
column3: mma hom aannyɛ hom tsenenee wɔ nyimpa enyim dɛ wonhu: ɔyɛ dɛm a
column4: hom nnyi akatua wɔ hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor no nkyɛn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ ereyɛ adɔyɛ a
column3: mma nnhɛn totorobɛnto wɔ w'enyim dɛ mbrɛ ndabrabafo no yɛ wɔ nhyiamudan nye abrɔn mu no
column4: ama woeenya nyimpa hɔ enyimnyam. Nokwar mese hom dɛ

column2: "Na sɛ ereyɛ adɔyɛ a
column3: mma wo nsa bankum nnhu dza wo nsa nyimfa reyɛ;"

column2: "ama w'adɔyɛ aaka nsumaa mu
column3: na w'Egya a ohu nsumaa mu no obotua wo kaw wɔ gua do."

column2: "Na sɛ hom rosɔr a
column3: mma hom nnyɛ dɛ ndabrabafo no; osiandɛ wɔpɛ dɛ wogyina nhyiamudan mu nye abɔntsen ntoaado sɔr
column4: ama nyimpa eehu. Nokwar mese hom dɛ

column2: "Na ɔwo dze
column3: sɛ erosɔr a
column6: sɔr ma w'Egya a ɔwɔ nsumaa mu no
column7: na w'Egya a ohu nsumaa mu no obotua wo kaw wɔ gua do."

column2: "Na hom rosɔr a
column3: mma hom nnyɛ kasafow ara gyan
column4: dɛ amanamamfo no: osiandɛ wɔdwen dɛ wobetsie hɔn wɔ hɔn kasa dodow ntsi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma hom nyɛ dɛ hɔn: osiandɛ hom Egya nyim ndzɛmba a ohia hom ansaana hom ribisa no."
"Dɛm ntsi hom nsɔr dɛm: Hɛn Egya a ewɔ sor
column3: wo dzin ho ntsew
column6: wɔnyɛ wo pɛ wɔ asaase do dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛ no wɔ sor."

column2: "Ma hɛn
column3: hɛn daa daa edziban ndɛ."

column2: "Na fa hɛn mfom kyɛ hɛn
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɛn so yɛdze kyɛ hɔn a wɔfom hɛn no."

column2: "Na mma mmfa hɛn nnkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu
column3: na yi hɛn fi mbusu mu.    [Na ɔwo na ahendzi
column4: nye tum nye enyimnyam yɛ wodze daa. Amen]"
column5: " # 6.13  Na yi hɛn fi mbusu mu:  Ne nkyerɛasee pa ara nye: Na gye hɛn fi ɔbɔnfo no ne nsamu.  #6.13: Tsetse akyerɛwfo no binom mmfa iyi nnsɔw do."

column2: "Na sɛ hom dze nyimpa hɔn mfom kyɛ hɔn a
column3: hom sor Egya so dze bɛkyɛ hom."

column2: "Na sɛ hom ammfa nyimpa hɔn mfom annkyɛ hɔn a
column3: hom Egya so remmfa hom mfom nnkyɛ hom."

column2: "Na eso sɛ hom ridzi mbuada a
column3: mma hom nnyɛ dɛ ndabrabafo no mmunamuna hom enyim: na wɔsɛɛ hɔn enyim ma nyimpa eehu dɛ woridzi mbuada. Nokwar mese hom dɛ

column2: "Na ɔwo dze
column3: sɛ idzi mbuada a
column4: sera wo tsirmu na hohor w'enyim;"

column2: "amma eennyi woho annkyerɛ nyimpa dɛ iridzi mbuada
column3: na mbom wɔ w'Egya a ɔwɔ nsumaa mu no enyim
column4: na w'Egya a ohu nsumaa mu no ɔbɛma wo akatua."

column2: "Mma hom mmpɛ akoradze nngu asaase do
column3: mbrɛ nkakraka nye nkandar sɛɛ no

column2: "na hom mpɛ akoradze ngu sor
column3: mbrɛ nkakraka nye nkandar nnsɛɛ no

column2: "na mbrɛ w'akoradze wɔ no
column3: hɔ na w'akoma so wɔ."

column2: "Nyimpadua ne kandzea nye enyiwa: dɛm ntsi sɛ w'enyiwa yɛ kor a
column3: wo nyimpadua nyina bɛyɛ kann."

column2: "Na sɛ w'enyiwa muo a
column3: wo nyimpadua nyina bɛyɛ kusuww. Na sɛ kan a ɔwɔ wo mu no yɛ sum a
column4: sum no ne kɛse tse dɛn!"

column2: "Obiara nntum nnsom ewuranom beenu; osiandɛ obekyir baako na ɔadɔ baako
column3: anaadɛ obedzi baako nyi na oebu ɔbaako enyimtsia. Hom runntum nnsom Nyankopɔn nye ahonyadze."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mese hom dɛ
column3: Mma hom nndwendwen hom nkwa ho
column4: dɛ ebɛnadze na hom bedzi anaa ebɛnadze na hom bɔnom
column6: dɛ ebɛnadze na hom bofura. Ana nkwa nnkyɛn edziban

column2: "Hom nhwɛ wimu nnoma dɛ wonndua na wommbu
column3: eso wɔmmboaboa ano nnhyɛ san do; naaso hom sor Egya nyɛn hɔn. Ana hom nnsom bo pii nnkyɛn hɔn?"

column2: "Na hom mu woana na ɔdwendwen a
column3: obotum dze basafa kor ato ne tsentsen do?"

column2: "Na ɔyɛ dɛn na hom dwendwen wɔ efuradze ho? Hom nhwɛ nsua haban mu nsukookoo mbrɛ wonyin: wɔnnyɛ edwuma
column3: eso wɔnntow asaaba:"

column2: "naaso mese hom dɛ Solomon n'enyimnyam nyina mu mpo ɔannkeka noho dɛ yinom mu kor."
"Na sɛ Nyankopɔn ma haban mu efuw a ɔwɔ ha ndɛ na ɔkyena wɔdze gu fononoo mu efuradze dɛm a
column3: ɔnnkɛyɛ dza ɔkyɛn yi pii ama hom

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma hom nndwendwen dɛ
column3: ebɛnadze na yebedzi? Anaa

column2: "Na dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina na amanamamfo hwehwɛ; na hom sor Egya nyim dɛ yinom nyina hia hom."
"Na hom ndzi kan nhwehwɛ n'ahenman nye ne tsenenee
column3: na wɔdze yinom nyina bɛka hom ho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma hom nndwendwen ɔkyena ho; na ɔkyena bɔdwendwen nankasa no ho. Da kor no mu bɔn dɔɔ so ma da no."
